query: SELECT id, auditName, auditCategory, description FROM auditTypes ORDER BY auditCategory, auditName
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user aVmfAzGaFwUYThZ.5c3d77929c0b --database mF7Zux5nFuxUoJfuPYEPAJ --execute SELECT id, auditName, auditCategory, description FROM auditTypes ORDER BY auditCategory, auditName

rows.description: Annual review of emergency plans, business continuity, disaster recovery, and communication protocols
